changeSet.author: mdaly
changeSet.comment: Add fields for DMD, HBA, and SMA Results.
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`HorizonCloudResult` ADD COLUMN `exonRange` VARCHAR(200) AFTER `hl7diseaseresult_id`, ADD COLUMN `variantName` VARCHAR(200) AFTER `exonRange`, ADD COLUMN `constantSpringCall` VARCHAR(255) AFTER `variantName`, ADD COLUMN `smn1Copies` VARCHAR(255) AFTER `constantSpringCall`, ADD COLUMN `enhancedSnpPresent` BOOLEAN AFTER `smn1Copies`;
changeSet.rollback: ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`HorizonCloudResult` DROP COLUMN `exonRange`, DROP COLUMN `variantName`, DROP COLUMN `constantSpringCall`, DROP COLUMN `smn1Copies`, DROP COLUMN `enhancedSnpPresent`;
